Title: Changeling
Overview: Christine Collins is overjoyed when her kidnapped son is brought back home. But when Christine suspects that the boy returned to her isn't her child, the police captain has her committed to an asylum.
Tagline: To find her son, she did what no one else dared.
Keywords: corruption, mother, nudity, minister, power, public, government, police, reunion, murder, conspiracy, los angeles, missing, mother love, criticism
production_companies: Imagine Entertainment, Malpaso Productions, Relativity Media
Cast: Angelina Jolie, Jeffrey Donovan, John Malkovich
